DOC.brief_title: Active Induction Labor Pregnancies Complicated With Oligohydramnios Term
DOC.detailed_description: The study design prospective study . The rate cesarean section maternal/fetal outcome compare pregnancy complicate isolated oligohydramnios term postdate pregnancy . All patient isolate oligohydramnios term ( 37-40 week ' gestation accord accurate last menstrual period first trim sonographic examination ) . Oligohydramnios define amniotic fluid index < 5 cm . The control group consist prolonged pregnancy absence spontaneous labor oligohydramnios . Prolonged pregnancy diagnose 41 gestational week complete accord accurate date last menstrual period first trim ultrasound . All patient accept join study give inform consent . All patient complete physical obstetrical examination . Vital sign record regular interval . The primary outcome measure define cesarean section rate pregnancy complicate isolated oligohydramnios manage induction labor .
